thread.title_full: good location, great breakfast, friendly but inexperienced staff. - Review of Hilton Paris Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 674kittyl
title: good location, great breakfast, friendly but inexperienced staff. - Review
text:
We arrived early at 10:30am after an overnight flight from the US, and the front desk staff checked us in at 11:30, which was a pleasant surprise. However when I asked for an upgrade to an executive room and get access to the lounge as a gold member, the staff, who appeared to be quite junior, explained it would be for a fee. later on after we got settled in our room, I ran into a manager and asked her. She was able to find us an upgrade for our next night without a problem.
Breakfast was great. room decor was modern and lovely. location was convenient. However both my husband and myself couldn't stop sneezing once we step into the room - i suspect the room was either dusty or some other pollutant that made us non-stop sneezing.
